description.english: In 2-4「magic swamp」, the mushrooms defeated the skeleton army

description.token: In 2-4「magic swamp」, the mushrooms defeated the skeleton army

description.english: In 2-5「The Stone of the Dead」, defeat the boss and mushrooms survive

description.token: In 2-5「The Stone of the Dead」, defeat the boss and mushrooms survive

description.english: In 3-1「Forest North Entrance」, defeat the boss without damaging any Tree Demons

description.token: In 3-1「Forest North Entrance」, defeat the boss without damaging any Tree Demons

displayName.english: We will not attack unless we are attacked
displayName.japanese: 人が私を攻撃しなければ、私は人を攻撃しない

description.english: In 3-3「Grotto Mountain Road」, clear the stage without attacking any invincible fairys

description.token: In 3-3「Grotto Mountain Road」, clear the stage without attacking any invincible fairys
